name: zeplin-html-to-pdf
description: AWS Lambda function that converts HTML pages to PDF documents

scripts.pack: rm -f package.zip && zip package.zip -r index.js utils lib fonts
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-1 --function-name htmlToPdf --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name htmlToPdf --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
